text: Dmitriy Kosyakov (born 28 February 1986 in Voronezh) is a Russian cyclist. ==Palmares== ;2008 :1st Stage 1 Tour de l'Avenir ;2009 :1st Stage 2 Circuit des Ardennes :1st Overall Tour du Loir-et-Cher ::1st Stage 2 ;2011 :1st Memorial Oleg Dyachenko :1st Stage 2 Grand Prix of Sochi :1st Stage 4 Tour of Bulgaria :2nd Mayor Cup :3rd Grand Prix of Donetsk ;2012 :2nd Overall Grand Prix of Sochi :3rd Grand Prix of Donetsk ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Voronezh
title: Dmitriy Kosyakov
